scripts.name: ai:full
scripts.command: npm run ai:validate && npm run ai:orchestrate:financial

scripts.name: api:build
scripts.command: npm run api:lint && npm run api:types

scripts.name: build:prod
scripts.command: npm run build:web && npm run build:server

scripts.name: build:prod:with-verify
scripts.command: npm run build:web && npm run build:server && node scripts/verify-api-url.mjs

scripts.name: build:server
scripts.command: echo 'Skipping server build for Vercel deployment'

scripts.name: build:web:preact:clean
scripts.command: rimraf node_modules/.vite dist && cross-env BUILD_WITH_PREACT=1 vite build

scripts.name: ci:build
scripts.command: cross-env CI=true npm run build && npm run bundle:check

scripts.name: ci:smart
scripts.command: npm run test:affected && npm run lint:affected

scripts.name: deploy:prod
scripts.command: npm run deploy:gate && npm run deploy:rollout && npm run deploy:monitor 30 0.5

scripts.name: deploy:staging
scripts.command: echo "Triggering staging deploy via GitHub Actions (see .github/workflows/deploy-staging.yml)"

scripts.name: dev:fast
scripts.command: node tools_local/node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k -n "TYPE,LINT,TEST" -c "cyan,yellow,green" "npm run check:fast" "npm run lint:affected" "npm run test:quick"

scripts.name: dev:full
scripts.command: npm run dev:infra && npm run dev

scripts.name: dev:memory
scripts.command: cross-env REDIS_URL=memory:// ENABLE_QUEUES=0 npm run dev:api

scripts.name: dev:parallel
scripts.command: node tools_local/node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k -n "CLIENT,API,WORKER-R,WORKER-P,METRICS" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:worker:reserve" "npm run dev:worker:pacing" "npm run metrics:local"

scripts.name: dev:qa
scripts.command: node tools_local/node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k "npm:dev" "sleep 3 && cross-env QA_BASE=http://localhost:5173 npm run qa:checklist"

scripts.name: dev:quick
scripts.command: cross-env NODE_ENV=development REDIS_URL=memory:// ENABLE_QUEUES=0 node tools_local/node_modules/tsx/dist/cli.mjs server/bootstrap.ts

scripts.name: dev:turbo
scripts.command: node tools_local/node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k -n "CLIENT,API,TYPE,LINT" -c "cyan,green,yellow,blue" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:api" "npm run check:watch" "npm run lint:watch"

scripts.name: fix:all
scripts.command: npm run fix:types && npm run test:quick

scripts.name: fix:types
scripts.command: npm run check && npm run lint:fix

scripts.name: ga:full
scripts.command: npm run ga:checklist && npm run ga:canary

scripts.name: lint:disable-warnings
scripts.command: eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --rule '@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any: off' --rule '@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars: off' --rule 'no-console: off' --rule 'react/no-unescaped-entities: off' --rule 'react-hooks/exhaustive-deps: off' --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern

scripts.name: prebuild
scripts.consolidationOpportunity: Duplicate command with: predev, pretest, prepreview

scripts.name: predev
scripts.consolidationOpportunity: Duplicate command with: prebuild, pretest, prepreview

scripts.name: preflight:phase0
scripts.command: npm run check && npm run lint && npm test

scripts.name: prepreview
scripts.consolidationOpportunity: Duplicate command with: predev, prebuild, pretest

scripts.name: pretest
scripts.consolidationOpportunity: Duplicate command with: predev, prebuild, prepreview

scripts.name: reset:deps
scripts.command: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install

scripts.name: reset:local-tools
scripts.command: rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && node scripts/ensure-complete-local.mjs

scripts.name: security:full
scripts.command: npm run security:console-logs && npm run security:validate && npm run security:monte-carlo

scripts.name: security:scan
scripts.command: npm run security:audit && npm run security:check

scripts.name: security:validate
scripts.command: npm run security:headers && npm run security:inputs && npm run security:audit

scripts.name: test
scripts.command: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration

scripts.name: test:all
scripts.command: npm-run-all --parallel test:unit test:types test:lint && npm run test:smoke

scripts.name: test:baseline
scripts.command: k6 run -e BASE_URL=http://localhost:5000 -e RATE=5 -e DURATION=2m -e VUS=20 tests/k6/k6-baseline.js

scripts.name: test:build-affected
scripts.command: npm run test:smart && npm run build:affected

scripts.name: test:parallel
scripts.command: node tools_local/node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k -n "UNIT,LINT,TYPE" "npm run test:unit" "npm run lint" "npm run check:fast"

scripts.name: validate:fast
scripts.command: npm run validate:architecture && npm run lint && npm run check:fast

scripts.name: validate:full
scripts.command: npm run validate:architecture && npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run check

consolidationRecommendations.recommendation: Remove scripts with :old suffix - these are legacy variants
These scripts have identical commands. Keep primary, remove alternates
Multiple smart test runners exist. Consolidate to single unified runner with --mode flag
Multiple review scripts exist. Consider consolidating
Multiple E2E test variants exist. Consider using parameterization
Multiple verify scripts exist. Consider consolidating
Multiple deployment variants. Consider environment-based parameterization
